Text: EOTT tanks wcolumn for teamcolumn for team EOTT TX NM Tks
EOTT Tanks EOTT TX NM Tks
EOTT PL Tks xlscopy in the mail Also a tank inspection book with all active sites will be coming to you Bill Glushko EOTT PL Tks

EOTT PL crude stations emission fees McElroy GF status compliance Cc on everything you wanted the ball is back in your court This will just be a quick update on the status of everything as I see it based on the information provided A priority package was sent to you and should arrive by which includes an updated diskette for the EOTT PL TANKS Excel workbook which now includes a station summary worksheet of TNRCC emission fees for the stations which owe them plus Crane and McElroy which dont Fees are due to TNRCC by Necessary account numbers have been obtained a detailed tank emissions worksheet with emissions by tank based on throughput and the total emissions for the station More importantly the conditions which trigger the TNRCC emissions fee are listed for your reference Hard copies of the station summary the more detailed tank summary and the TANKS tank emission computer printouts for the sites are provided For your info only I also markedup a tank listing and tank inspection schedule which indicate updates I made since last month Regulatory Compliance Texas No inspection fees for SIC Emissions fees due by See above NMex No fees Tank regulations in development No problem Federal NSPS New Mexico tanks LocoHills West Maljamar are Kb subject and require control unless they meet exemption Further investigation and documentation required As always my pleasure to be of assistance Bill Glushko memo
